thread.title: Christchurch Port Hills fires: What you need to know

title: Christchurch Port Hills fires: What you need to know

locations.name: old tai tapu road  old tai tapu road

text:
Selwyn Events Centre in Lincoln 
Te Hapua Halswell Centre, Halswell Rd 
Nga Hau e Wha Marae, Pages Rd 
There is also the Facebook page, Evacuation Housing , for evacuated residents to ask for help, and allow others to offer temporary accommodation to those evacuated. 
ROAD CLOSURES 
Worsleys Road in Port Hills is closed just past Cashmere Road to all traffic and residents and a police checkpoint is in place. 
Worsleys Track closed from Worsleys Road 
Early Valley Road closed from Old Tai Tapu Road. 
Holmes Road from Old Tai Tapu Road 
Old Tai Tapu Road between Osterholts Road and SH75 
Dyers Pass Road between Hackthorne Road to Governors Bay Road 
Summit Road between Gebbies Pass and Rapaki Track 
Hoon Hay Valley Rd closed due to rubbernecking. Residents can still access their properties. 
Christchurch Adventure Park is closed. 
HEALTH WARNING: 
Smoke may irritate the eyes, nose, throat and airways, and more serious symptoms could include a runny or sore nose, dry or sore throat, sore nose, cough, tightness of the chest, or difficulty breathing. 
Avoid exposure where possible by staying indoors and closing windows and doors - Stuff
